h1. Media Library

Media Library is a place where users can manage medias such as audios, images, videos. In here, users can upload, view media in Sites Explorer.

 !F9.gif! 

h2. How to use media library?

To use the thumbnails view, do the followings:

1\. Go to *ECM* ->*File Explorer*.

2. Select any drive.

3. Choose media folder--> choose image node.

4. On the *Select tab* --> choose *actions*

5. Click on the upload file !F10.gif! icon to upload an image.

If users want to upload audio files, they should choose audio node or to upload video files, they should choose video node on media folder.
